titles.title: Give to Our God Immortal Praise

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: Give to the Lord of lords renown, the King of kings with glory crown; His mercies ever shall endure, when lords and kings are known no more.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: He fills the sun with morning light, He bids the moon direct the night; His mercies ever shall endure, when suns and moons shall shine no more.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: The Jews He freed from Pharaoh's hand and brought them to the promised land; wonders of grace to God belong, repeat His mercies in your song.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: He saw the Gentiles dead in sin and felt His pity move within; His mercies ever shall endure, when death and sin shall reign no more.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: He sent His Son with pow'r to save from guilt, and darkness, and the grave; wonders of grace to God belong, repeat His mercies in your song.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Through this vain world He guides our feet and leads us to His heav'nly seat; His mercies ever shall endure, when this vain world shall be no more.
